comments:
I'm using I20051101-0010, and it fails to find the shared libraries:

/opt/local/eclipse/I1101-0010/eclipse/eclipse -vm \
  /opt/local/j2sdk1.4.2_08/bin/java

Give me an error:
/opt/local/eclipse/I1101-0010/eclipse/configuration/org.eclipse.osgi/bundles/50/1/.cp/libswt-motif-3212.so:
ld.so.1: java: fatal: libm.so.2: open failed: No such file or directory


I have libm.so -> libm.so.1
bash$ uname -a
SunOS unknown 5.8 Generic_117350-26 sun4u sparc SUNW,Sun-Blade-100


the full log:

This was caused by an upgrade to the build machine to Solaris 10. As there were
no changes to the library for this build, only a rebuild, I have replaced the
binaries with those from the last integration build.

I am keeping this bug open to track the problem of building the libraries in the
future.
